title: Gamend
description: Open source game server with authentication, users, lobbies, server scripting and admin portal

features.title: Authentication
features.description: Supports multiple authentication methods: Email, Magic-link, Oauth, JWT and Session.

features.title: Users
features.description: User registration, login, password reset, email verification, profile management.

features.title: Lobbies
features.description: Create and manage game lobbies with customizable settings and real-time updates.

features.title: User Data (WIP)
features.description: Store and retrieve custom user data key-value pairs.

features.title: Server Scripting
features.description: Write custom game server logic using Elixir scripts.

features.title: Admin & Monitoring
features.description: Admin portal for managing users, lobbies, Sentry integration and monitoring server metrics.

features.title: UI & Theming
features.description: Built-in web UI for authentication, lobby management, and admin portal.

features.title: Persistence & Updates
features.description: Flexible storage options: SQLite (in memory) and PostgreSQL; and real-time data updates.

features.title: Integrations
features.description: Easily integrate with popular services: Discord, Apple, Google, Facebook, Steam.
